prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with an eerie presence and floating features.
I want a dark-themed Pokemon that has a mischievous grin and shadowy limbs.
Generate a spooky Pokemon with a spectral body and haunting eyes.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of fear, with a smoky appearance.
Imagine a phantom Pokemon that can blend into the shadows and surprise its foes.
Design a ghostly creature that is both playful and intimidating, with a floating form.
Show me a Pokemon with a haunting aura, featuring a unique color palette of purples.
